info.name: Message Service API
info.description: A RESTFul API works with message resource and detect if the message is a palindrome

response.name: Malformed Path Params or Malformed Payload

query.description: sortby fields allow 'createdAt', 'updateAt', 'message', 'palindromic', '_id' use - for descending
use 0|1 to filter palindrmic message

response.name: successful operation
response.body:
{
 "data": [
  {
   "_id": "Ut dolore ut",
   "message": "mollit nisi anim dolor",
   "palindromic": "Duis amet mollit",
   "createdAt": "ipsum voluptate",
   "updatedAt": "amet",
   "__v": 91953299
  },
  {
   "_id": "sed dolor",
   "message": "in fugiat dolore",
   "palindromic": "irure eu in culpa fugiat",
   "createdAt": "ullamco magna sed",
   "updatedAt": "anim sint",
   "__v": -91571328
  }
 ],
 "currentPage": -52546495,
 "currentSize": 99845066,
 "totalPages": -47591576,
 "totalRecords": 4329807
}
